name: Fisherman's House
description:
You have been mysteriously captured by the terrifying fisherman. The fisherman is famous for kidnapping his victims to eat them afterwards. Your mission? To escape as quickly as possible before the fisherman hatches you.

The fisherman's house is awaiting you inside this game, in this house there are all sorts of tools and keys that can help you to escape from the house. But you should be careful because the fisherman hears very precisely.


Features

Randomly generated puzzles — Each game includes new randomly generated locations where items like keys or tools can be hidden.

Different Levels of Difficulty — There are different levels of difficulty that change the speed of movement of the fisherman.

He can hear you — Not only the sounds you make inside the game, but also your microphone is part of the game. However, the microphone can be turned off if you like.


Have fun and enjoy exploring!
